data.actual_result: Splash screen pops up and won't go away until you actually interact with Discord window
data.expected_result: No idea if the splash screen is supposed to show again, anyway it should not stay forever
data.short_description: Toggling split screen will prevent the splash screen from going away
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in any channel, without any menu open - Split screen (requires Android 7+)
